Title: How Do We Set Up Our Company to Outlive Us?
Description:
Today, we hear from:

•      A business leader who wants his family business to outlive the founding generation

•      Craig Groeschel on how to finally change your bad habits

•      A business owner who wants to switch from contractors to team members

•      A leader who is trying to figure out if his team member is overloaded or underperforming
